titles.skilfra: Skill in framework and library and tools

info.name: Rafael Hidalgo

workitems.descrip:
Coordination of developments in the O-SGC commercial system; carrying out the analysis tasks of the required solution, planning and assigning tasks to programmers, monitoring modifications and system implementations, specializing in the development of batch biller programs. 
Coordination of development of TDA commercial management application . (Creator of Docker development environments and rest api in golang).

workitems.work: Electronic billing project in Energuate Guatemala
workitems.descrip: Coordination of developments in the electronic certification system or FEL for Energuate in charge of creating the demon that communicates with Sap of Guatemala to sign the invoices of the commercial system

workitems.work: Electronic billing project in Salvador AES
workitems.descrip: Coordination of developments in the electronic certification system or FEL for Aes in charge of creating the demon that communicates with the Hacienda de Salvador to sign the invoices of the commercial system, this certifies the legal documents of the company
AWS service support in golang creating new requests.
Ticketa flutter project for public lotteries.

educationitems.descrip: is a professional capable of researching, analyzing, designing, building and evaluating computer systems that integrate hardware, software, and communications with digital devices and their interfaces with other devices and users, to satisfy the scientific, technological and functional needs of businesses and organizations in a national economy.

info.aboutme:
Hi, I'm Rafael, I'm passionate about backend and frontend development,
 I'm an expert in library for rest api service and I like frontend development in React.
